author: Adrian Collins
description:
To read A Sword of Gold and Ruin by Anna Smith Spark and its predecessor A Sword of Bronze and Ashes is to be transported in time. To go back to before phones and computers and mass print, to when books were prized possessions of churches and the lords and lairds of the land. To […]

The post REVIEW: A Sword of Gold and Ruin by Anna Smith Spark appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: A Sword of Gold and Ruin by Anna Smith Spark
